website_summaries.verdict: Snazzy over-the-knee wide-fitting boots in buttery soft calf leather.
pros: The 1.5-inch heel is just right for comfort
Grommet details add a nice touch
These boots look expensive and fashion-forward
cons: Some found the boots too wide at the top
Not for short people either, since they run tall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice looks expensive for the price very comfortable buy a size up runs small.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon CustomerMarlene

customer_reviews.title: Leather is soft and boot is very nice quality. The foot feels true to size
customer_reviews.text: Leather is soft and boot is very nice quality. The foot feels true to size. I have wide feet and fit the 7.5 (my regular size) perfect with socks. I'm also short (5'1") but the boots still fit comfortably with the top of the front of the boot hitting above my knee. You can't see much leg when I have these on. I've also got big calves and was able to pull the regular (not wide calf) up, even if putting them on and getting them off is less like a strip tease and more like wrestling an alligator. They fit, were a great deal, I'll wear them, they're a keeper.
customer_reviews.author: Rynoceros

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots!
customer_reviews.text: Sweet real leather boots! Love the lower heel. I have a 32" inseam so if you have shorter legs, might want to rethink these because the back comes up at the bend of my knee. Fine for me though.
customer_reviews.author: MzV

customer_reviews.title: Love the look but not super comfy
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful glossy leather boots. A bit on the narrow side, and a bit cumbersome to get on however.
customer_reviews.author: smashbox24cr

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Love these boot. I recommend a half size k bigger for comfort. The boot is taut which gives me the impression it will be durable. I’m the unprofessional professional so I wear otk boots with skinny pants and blazers so this is important when you wear boot like sneakers. The small heel has a bit of rubber on it which means less likely to slip. I love !!!! And recommend and receive tons of compliments.
customer_reviews.author: Tee

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! They are so comfortable, you can smell the leather, and you can tell the quality is sturdy. I received so many compliments the first day I wore them. Only thing to remember is that leather is tight at first but will form to your feet as you wear them in. If you even think you have bigger calves then get the wide calf.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsea

customer_reviews.title: I love it coz so comfortable and good quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought size 7M wide calf and fits perfectly. my knee size is around 15.2inch and calf is 13 - 14". Therefore, if your calves are bigger than 16 inch, these will not fit you. I love it coz so comfortable and good quality. The seller is awesome too.
customer_reviews.author: Organic

customer_reviews.title: Super High Quality Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I wear size 8.5 and ordered the 8.5 and they definitely have room to wear thick socks (which makes sense with boots like these). The leather is very stiff so they will take some breaking in - that’s the only reason why I took off a star. I’m petite so it will take some time to soften up the leather so the backs of my knees are more comfortable in these when I sit down. These are definitely made for a regular height woman and not a petite but I knew that before I ordered them.
customer_reviews.author: Happywithlevis

customer_reviews.title: Shorties need not apply
customer_reviews.text: Not for short people, even if you have small feet! I am 5’2” and wear a size 6/6.5 and this over the knee boot was taller than my mid thigh. And I can’t scrunch them because that just drives the zipper into your leg.
customer_reviews.author: AMJ

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, a little stiff around the top of boot for me.
customer_reviews.text: I liked them, very nice looking. I have skinny legs, and I found that the back of the boot was stiff and it would cut into the back of my leg when walking or sitting. They are also higher then my other over the knee which are just over the knee, which I personally prefer. Very stylish and cool looking for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Tiburon

customer_reviews.title: Not quite as "wide calf" as one would hope
customer_reviews.text: Love the boots...but not as "wide calf" as advertised...the elastic at the back of the boots is minimal and lacks stretch, so until the suede stretches out naturally they will be worn buckling at the ankles...if the shipping from Canada back to the U.S. wasn't so horrendous I would return
customer_reviews.author: nineinchgails

customer_reviews.title: "Where did you get those boots?"
customer_reviews.text: The whole look of these boots is fabulous. They're sleek and stylish and made of a smooth leather. The height and size of the heel is ideal for casual wear and walking ability. They come up just on the knee, maybe slightly above and I've got long legs. They are a tapered fit, not wide or slouchy. A little bit tight in the foot area but I think they'll loosen up with wear. Great find and great price.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Toomey

customer_reviews.title: The left is smaller than the right
customer_reviews.text: Strange because I have several pairs of these boots and the left is smaller than the right. But the color is a gorgeous true gray and they look fabulous. I had ordered a gray from HSN and returned it because it was more mauve. These are a beautiful charcoal gray.
customer_reviews.author: Writer2122

customer_reviews.title: The color, quality, and fit is everything I hoped they would offer
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous color and quality. Very comfortable. The shape of the boot is very flattering on me. The heel is just short of 2 inches, which is more flattering than most low-heel boots. The color is rich neutral dark brown. The detailing is really attractive, as shown in the photo. I have average calves (14 inches) and thick thighs (16 inches just above the knee) and these fit perfectly. There is enough taper at the ankle that I can wear a dress or skirt with a hem that covers the top of the boot without it making my legs look like logs. I am very pleased with the value of the boots.
customer_reviews.author: SunnyBrookTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: These boots were made for walking, talking, and sass!
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots! Everyone comments on these boots everywhere I go I get asked about them. For the price you cannot beat it! And they protect them when they ship them to you it’s almost like it comes in an armored vessel because these boots mean attitude! Do wear thinner socks at first until they are broken in. These are great boots and very comfortable even though they may look intimidating! Try them out and I bet you will fall in love and the heal is not overwhelming either. And these are TRUE TO SIZE! Happy walking!
customer_reviews.author: Maria

customer_reviews.title: These boots are beautiful; they fit perfectly and the foxy color was ...
customer_reviews.text: These boots are beautiful; they fit perfectly and the foxy color was the same as in the photo. They come just above the knee and thet were easy to put on. Love the studs and color. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Debrah

customer_reviews.title: Buy a 1/2 size bigger and get a shoe stretcher
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love the boots and I bought a size 7 when I used to wear a 6-1/2. Still fit snugly. I'm currently using shoe stretchers to widen them a bit. I'd say go a half size bigger and buy a shoe stretcher if you have fat feet. Get lots of compliments on them and they are gorgeous. I have the grey pair as well and they really hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Juno

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and stylish
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. My calves are wide so it fits perfectly. I'm only 5 feet tall so the heel height is perfect. The rubber soles are great to walk around with out worrying about slipping and not noisy to walk around in.
customer_reviews.author: 925LH

customer_reviews.title: Somewhat large
customer_reviews.text: These boots are gorgeous and truly over the knee. The wide calf are very wide so if you are in the borderline maybe you don't need to get the wide calf one. Thy are also a bit large around the ankle. For an over the knee boot, its not that hard to get on and off. Love them.
customer_reviews.author: porvel

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I know these aren't leather, but the faux is just tacky in the brown. I got my usual 7.5, and this goes well beyond my knees. I realize we can't all have the same calf height, but I didn't think these were proportionate. The back of my knees were uncomfortable, and I found these more frumpy than stylish.
customer_reviews.author: sothlice

customer_reviews.title: Nice price.  Fits tad tight to as expected. (wide foot people)
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. I decided to take to a cobbler to widen and loosen calf (for over jeans and pants). It was quicker and cheaper than to go through Amazon return for a boot that may end up being too big. Very good value boot. Get 'em. Be sure to spray them with sealer👌
customer_reviews.author: Lupe

customer_reviews.title: baggy fit around the ankle and the overall style ends up looking like pirate costume boots
customer_reviews.text: On the plus side, these boots are plenty tall enough to actually go over the knee. Unfortunately, once on, they aren't nearly as sleek looking as I would have preferred; they have a loose, baggy fit around the ankle and the overall style ends up looking like pirate costume boots. The fit was comfortable and the sizing was accurate.
customer_reviews.author: cshively

customer_reviews.title: Torn elastic - ruined after second wear
customer_reviews.text: (Written by Connor's wife.) For a very short while, I thought these boots were great. Better quality than expected for the low price. The shaft was pretty tight to wear over skinny jeans, but I liked the appearance and thought the shaft would ease with wear, so no big deal. Well, just the second time I wore them, the elastic at the top of one boot ripped badly. It's way too noticeable to wear again, and even if I could ignore how bad it looks, I'm sure that wearing the boots would only make the tear worse. Definitely not worth buying just to wear twice. Spend your money elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Connor D. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boot
customer_reviews.text: The boot were gorgeous! The shoe part was a perfect fit but unfortunately they bagged at the ankle. I don’t know if Zit was because I am short . I was really disappointed that they didn’t work out because they are an incredible buy . They are a $200 boot easily!
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and Sexy!
customer_reviews.text: These fit perfectly from the minute I put them on and they are so comfortable. I get compliments every single time I wear them - which is every chance I get. They are so cool! One thing to be aware of: I wore them with white pants and the black dye inside of the boots rubbed off on my jeans. I almost always wear them with black jeans so it doesn’t really matter to me but be cautious wearing light colored pants.
customer_reviews.author: TWin

customer_reviews.title: These boots did not fit
customer_reviews.text: I was so excited, but should have read the reviews prior to ordering. They did not fit over my calves. Super cute but to small. Even my daughter tried them on who is super skinny and said they were too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For tall women
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, awesome boot. Unfortunately, at 5'4", I'm too short for these over the knee boots. The back of the boot hits high behind my knee making it hard to bend my knees.
customer_reviews.author: BmoreLaw

customer_reviews.title: Classy
customer_reviews.text: The heel cup is very hard and it takes quite a while to break it in, otherwise it is a very classy boot.
customer_reviews.author: susigkeiten

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot Vince Camuto never fails
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots.., I probably have a medium to a wide Calf And they are perfect over jeans..
customer_reviews.author: russ

customer_reviews.title: You will not regret purchasing these
customer_reviews.text: Everything about these is just perfect. Quality. Color. Fit. The packaging was beyond exceptional. Very sexy and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: Momahawk

customer_reviews.title: Another great boot from Vince Camuto!
customer_reviews.text: Boots are very well made and comfortable. Received quick and in excellent condition!
customer_reviews.author: Punnie

customer_reviews.title: This is a dress boot and anything you put them with will Shine.
customer_reviews.text: I have never been disappointed with any Vince Camuto shoe that I bought. This is a beautiful boot and is more like a thigh boot. (lower thigh) comfortable and Sassy.
customer_reviews.author: Gizzelle

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love these boots
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these boots! I have athletic calves and they are too snug to fit with jeans comfortably. That's fine for me, I love them that much. I'm 5'3 and they hit well over the knee. I purchased the Carob and Black pairs. This is a well made boot with beautiful leather. I'm quite pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Foot is perfect but too large around the ankle. Ordered wide calf by mistake.
customer_reviews.text: I hate making returns so I will find some use for them or regift them. They don't look like really leather but they are still a fine looking boot. They feel a little clunky to walk in but may be great for snow days. We'll see.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, sturdy, and stylish!
customer_reviews.text: These are the perfect fall /winter boots. So long as the ground isn't too slippery these will always be my go to footwear. Warm, comfy, and sturdy, whenever I wear these I can be sure to get compliments!
customer_reviews.author: SB007

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended
customer_reviews.text: I ordered normal calf and I received a wide calf,, too bad
customer_reviews.author: Dalia ALNimer

customer_reviews.title: Stylish and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these and ride my Harley’s in them. Stylish and comfortable. Only problem is that some of the rivets fell out.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen S.

customer_reviews.title: Very narrow
customer_reviews.text: The boots are very nice quality. However, they are so narrow that I couldn't get my foot in them so I am returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Judles

customer_reviews.title: Great fitting and comfortable boot
customer_reviews.text: Great fitting and comfortable boot. Little taller than I thought it would be... Truly an thigh high vs. just over the knee. EXCELLENT value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Grace Koreyasu

customer_reviews.title: Want to return for 1/2 size larger beaus the way ...
customer_reviews.text: Want to return for 1/2 size larger beaus the way the instep is made you can not zip boot. Applied to return but want to take money out for return. When ordering it said free return?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too tight on the calves & ankles but comfortable on the feet
customer_reviews.text: Too tight on the calves & ankles but comfortable on the feet. Need to get it stretched to fit right
customer_reviews.author: Nessa

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Great boots. I like it it is just that when I zipped and it is kind of too tied. But it is nice. Always get compliments!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ayele

customer_reviews.title: Great fit! I’m 5’8 with athletic calves and these fit snug in the calf, but not too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! I already love Vince Camuto shoes, but these boots are sleek and flawless! The box came a little banged up, but in decent condition and can still be used to store the boots in the off season because there are no holes. Highly recommend these in the brown leather!
customer_reviews.author: Christin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth double the money
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these boots in brown last year and wore them all winter. They are still beautiful, expensive looking and they stay up! I did order 1/2 size up and they fit perfect with thin socks. I am here to order a second pair in black.
customer_reviews.author: Taura

customer_reviews.title: Best day ever
customer_reviews.text: Im 5’3, shoes size 7, wear medium size clothes. The boots fit perfectly- not too nigh up, not jamming my thighs-the opening on the top has a nice clearance and the material is sturdy, not getting all sad and slouchy! Cant wait for the fall weather to arrive so i could show them off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wide in weird places
customer_reviews.text: I have muscular calves so I figured these would be great boots - real leather and wide calf. The leather is very nice, but the wide calf part is... weird. My calves are wide where the muscles are. These boots are wide in the ankles and knees; the actual calf not so much. It's a shame about the fit; quality of the boot itself is great.
customer_reviews.author: katro

customer_reviews.title: love how they feel
customer_reviews.text: super comfortable, just as expected. color was perfect and the style super cute. I just didn't have an outfit for the boots.
customer_reviews.author: glenys fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great boots!
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is that I wish I hadn't read the review that said they look like pirate boots - now I can't get that image out of my head when I wear them
customer_reviews.author: Ctdev

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot
customer_reviews.text: Although the boot was a tad bit higher than I wanted, it is a beautiful boot and is very comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Fuller

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots. The look great and keep my legs warm.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Boots
customer_reviews.text: This is my 6th pair of Vince Camuto boots love his style wear forever just keep getting new colors. True to size.
customer_reviews.author: Marie E. Dallmann

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These boots are great!!!--The have a perfect fit. I've received so many complements.
customer_reviews.author: MsGray

customer_reviews.title: Well made & beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly on my 5’4 -114 lbs frame, enough room for fitted jeans. Easy to slide in, not so difficult as my other VC over the knee suede boots.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Peng

customer_reviews.title: Fancy boot
customer_reviews.text: Fancy boot just a little tight around the ankle area overall great quality and style
customer_reviews.author: tiffany Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality boots
customer_reviews.text: A little tight at the ankle getting then on. Nice quality boots.
customer_reviews.author: JWDART

customer_reviews.title: Can’t beat tha price
customer_reviews.text: Awwwwwesome boots and you can’t beat tha price!! I am 5 foot even so even with short legs they work!!!
customer_reviews.author: Zanzi Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Georgeous leather boots
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots, slightly tight for a size 9 which I normally wear, the main issue for me was the calf was too big, I have smaller calf’s and had to return:(
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer G

customer_reviews.title: The top of the boot doesn’t fit the leg well. Too big and shapeless!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots to look at. Didn’t LOOK GOOD on! Too bad!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Double-Z

customer_reviews.title: Hurts ankle
customer_reviews.text: Hurts on my ankle bone. Trying to soften up the leather some but uncertain if it work
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Returning - too tight
customer_reviews.text: I like the style and color but the boots were too tight around my calves. Bunched up at ankles. Also, the back of the boot is very high for someone who is 5’2”. Unfortunately returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality of leather was good, maybe a bit stiff but they felt like ...
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 7.5 or 8, and have narrow feet. I’m 5’8” tall. I ordered the 7.5 bc it was much cheaper than the 8. The boot fit (so i don’t think it technically runs small, but maybe runs narrow). The fit issue was more the shape of the boot shaft. It was the correct height for me, but was very wide looking at the top. It made my legs look thick in the knee area, which was weird. Also kind of piratey. Had to return. Quality of leather was good, maybe a bit stiff but they felt like they would stay up.
customer_reviews.author: Nicci C

customer_reviews.title: Yasss hunni!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous! Smells like fresh leather which I love! Amazing deal, fits like a glove, could not be happier!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Firs perfect at foot but is tight at ankle and lower shaft beautiful boot disappointed in overall fit
customer_reviews.author: alicia parsons

customer_reviews.title: These are beautiful! They run a small according to my daughter ...
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful! They run a small according to my daughter so I ordered a size larger and they worked good for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: dmor

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Too high for my small frame....I will be returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful it was a gift but it was to small for the person
customer_reviews.author: Gabriela

customer_reviews.title: Promo sevice
customer_reviews.text: I like the quality of the coots and was impressed by the ease of ordering and receiving them in a timely manner.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Falco

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy leather construction
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable and sexy if you're petite these boots are thigh high I'm 5' even and it reaches just about mid thighs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Expensive Looking
customer_reviews.text: More like a thigh-hi, this boot is cut slenderer in the leg than many and is very flattering.
customer_reviews.author: Blondie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice boot quality wise very tight on back of leg ...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice boot quality wise very tight on back of leg where elastic is not constable when bending or sitting down wish it was a knee hi style boot was very hard to get on and off . Will b returning.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda

customer_reviews.title: I actually got more than what I expected!
customer_reviews.text: Love them. I’m plus size and it is so very hard to find over the knee boots
customer_reviews.author: Roshell Green

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful boot
customer_reviews.text: This is a beautiful boot that is made well. It fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots! They fit great. They look and feel wonderful!
customer_reviews.author: BG_colorado

customer_reviews.title: I love the boots but my calf was too large for ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the boots but my calf was too large for that type of boots.....somebody please make more double wide calf boots
customer_reviews.author: Rita

customer_reviews.title: Chic 🔥
customer_reviews.text: Most comfortable boots I’ve owned and the detailing is amazing 🔥
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I opened the box and fell on love with them. They're very comfortable and stylish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These boots are so comfortable I can wear them all day without my feet hurting a bit!
customer_reviews.author: Connie W.

customer_reviews.title: Dissappointed with a blister
customer_reviews.text: Leather was not soft & it rubbed ankle & the backs of my knee.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: gorgeous boots
customer_reviews.text: The fit was perfect!! Very pleased with this boot purchase.
customer_reviews.author: D. McNeill

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really tight on my calves. Didn’t have a lot of bend for going over my knees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & oh so sexy!
customer_reviews.text: So very sexy! Lots of compliments. Comfortable to wear all day.
customer_reviews.author: M Blue

customer_reviews.title: quality leather. restrained elegant style.
customer_reviews.text: yes. ordered up as suggested in reviews. normally take an 8. ordered 8 1/2. perfect. and the leather! - buttery quality. and the detail! fashionably funky but subtle, classy. also - heel just right. love them.
customer_reviews.author: gail bishop

customer_reviews.title: Great look. Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I am a size 9 shoe and these are made for an individual that has little meat on their calves. The boot still fits however, a bit snug in the calves. In the "shoe" portion, I will need a sock to keep from sliding a little bit. Great look. Great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Mom

customer_reviews.title: Not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: These boots are not leather; they are some type of polyurethane or synthetic material. The boots had a very strong, and unpleasant odor, that was overwhelming when I first opened the box.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Smith

customer_reviews.title: I love these booth fit just as 7 and half fit ...
customer_reviews.text: I love these booth fit just as 7 and half fit perfectly nice. Leather smoothly feel came on time
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Clarke

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful, stylish, comfortable boots
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful boots that fit well. Very well-made of quality leather. Will be buying many more pairs of Vince Camuto shoes.
customer_reviews.author: NOTvegan

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: The price of the boot was reduced I’d like a price adjustment
customer_reviews.author: sharon thomas

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely beautiful boots! Only wish they weren't as tall
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely beautiful boots! Only wish they weren't as tall. Would love if they were just below knee. I'm 5'5' Sadly had to return.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Vince Camuto Women's Bestan Over The Knee Boot
product_meta.description:
Over the knee boot with grommet detail

Vince Camuto is a true footwear innovator, both of design and of industry. The designer and creator of the Camuto group, Vince Camuto produces many brands and styles, and Vince Camuto women's shoes are among the most beautiful and finely crafted footwear available.
feature_bullets: Side zip closure1.5 inch heel with microsuede lining
